Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Name's Bartender. People call me Bartender."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "You can get any drink in the Multiverse, 'slong as you know the name."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "There's a pool go'n to guess my real name. Talk t'Telken. He should be around here somewhere."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "No jostle'n the pinball machine!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "If yer gonna start a fight, start it outside!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "We don’t serve their kind here...you know...Morons."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "No blasters! No blasters!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "I'll tell ya a secret about my name…"::Whispers:: "It's Bartender. Dunno why nobody believes me!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Stay awhile, and listen...to me old stories about growing up in the Bar." ::Bartender drones on for hours.::

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "If yer gonna chew bubblegum and kick butt...don't leave the gum under the golf table."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "I dunno how the Bar changes the game's themes. Just gimme yer BR and the bar does the rest."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Go to sketchygames.net. Some guy named Peter paid me to say that."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "You break the pool cues yer gonna be sorry!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "The bar's not responsible for any damages caused by the darts taking off on their own and stabb'n ya in the eye."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "I hear you can get Yeagled around here for an ice cream bar. Whatever that means."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Do. Not. Look. Under. The. Pool. Table."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "The MC was in here earlier look'n for his bomb. Said something 'bout give'n it back to the Covenant."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Y'just missed Shepard. He's got his omni-whatsis all twisted over some kinda machine-gods."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Y'just missed Shepard. He’s got his omni-whatsis all twisted over some kinda machine-gods."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "If yer look'n for good stories, go talk to Sir Terry. Don't ask him to sing the Hedghog song. Children play this game."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "If ya see a man with a wizard hat on that says “Wizzard” with two Zs, tell'im he owes me BR!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Ook, ook. Er I mean, ye want some peanuts?"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Bounty Hunters...we serve their kind here."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "No smoke'n in here...less yer wizard arrive'n precisely when ya mean too. Then pipe weed only. And I like the smoke rings!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "What? We aint got no “Preciouses” around here. You want the Bar at the left of the multiverse."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "One winged angels? That must be rough. Flying around in circles all the time."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "I aint never seen no little white guys with a red ball on their heads. Never. Kupo."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: Thwip thwip!

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Mmrgrrllggrrglll! Sorry, got something stuck in me throat."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "'Your Princess is in another Castle' is a favorite 'round here with plumbers and turtles."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Have you not heard? It was my understanding that everyone had heard." ::The rest of the patrons all cry out in terror as Bartender starts singing Surfin Bird::

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "He is vengeance. He is the night. He is the one leaving guano in the bathroom. I KNOW IT'S YOU WAYNE!"

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "Don't panic. If ya need a towel, get one out of the box. Never go anywhere without yer towel."

Dialog.name: bartender
Dialog.Text: "This big blue box appeared and some trench coated guy stepped out, yelled “Allons-y!” then they vanished. Takes all kinds 'round here."
